name: Entagotchi
description:
This game was made by Team Consid Nypan as part of GGJ 2023 - Entagotchi is a tamagotchi-like game where you take care of your own ent by watering it, nurturing it and buffing it up to its full size! Whatever you do, don't forget your ent, or it might die!

Just like a Tamagotchi, this game is slow and meant to be played next to whatever it is your doing - whether it be playing games with friends, working or just reading email.
